questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided video of the equipment.
upload the image of equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and the bar code again
check and confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment
prepare the Incident/Damage and Missing report
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230
shift the equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether the power cord is defective

videos.src: assets/videos/CHECKING THE CONTINUITY OF POWER CORD.mp4
videos.videoName: CHECKING THE CONTINUITY OF POWER CORD

questions.question: replace the power cord with a new one
check and confirm whether the AC fuse is blown out
replace the fuse with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check the continuity of switch and confirm whether the switch is defective
replace the switch with a new one
check and confirm whether the input AC voltage of 230 is available
check and confirm whether the power input connector is damage or broken
replace the power input connector with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the power input pin connector

questions.question: check and confirm whether the input voltage is available at the Transformer

videos.videoName: Video for checking volt. Of transformer

questions.question: check for any loose connection or breakage of cables from power input connector to transformer.
reseat or replace the cables accordingly
check and confirm whether the transformer output voltage is available

videos.videoName: Video for checking o/p volt. Of transformer

questions.question: replace the transformer with a new one
check and confirm whether the DC- DC Convertor board output voltage is available.
, replace / repair the DC- DC Convertor board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the DC- DC Convertor board

questions.question: check and confirm for any loose connection or breakage of cable from power supply to control board
reseat or replace the cables accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether unable to change the pulse intensity
open the equipment as shown in the video, check the continuity of potentiometer and confirm whether it is defective.
replace the potentiometer with a new one
repair / replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the pulse output is available when the intensity is fixed
check and confirm whether the probe is properly placed
reseat the probe properly
cross check the probe with another equipment and confirm whether it is defective
replace the probe with a new one
check and confirm for pin breakage at the probe connector
replace the probe pin connector with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the probe pin

questions.question: open the equipment as shown in the video, check for loose connection or breakage of cable from pin connector to power supply
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the DC- DC Convertor board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the DC- DC Convertor board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON but the display is plan / blank
open the equipment as shown in the video, replace the display with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for further assistance through video call.
Thanks
